question:
[Nola] and her mother [Daniel] made breakfast together. [Jamie] was mad at her son, [Richard]. She found he'd been stealing from her purse. [Nola] and her Grandfather [Carlos] enjoyed feeding the ducks at the park [Daniel] was so proud of his son, [Richard]. he received a great scholarship to college. [Jamie] took her daughter [Nola] to the ice cream parlor after school for a sweet treat. Since [Nola] gets out of school earlier than her brother [Oscar], he missed out on the trip to get ice cream. [Nola] took her brother [Oscar] and other brother [Joel] with her to eat pasta at a pasta buffet.
Question: How is [Carlos] related to [Joel]?
